elements.comments: This aspect allows the element to be picked up in the Season of Ambitions as though it were a maverick, leader, ascension card, or similar.
This aspect keeps the element from being picked up in the Season of Ambitions, even if it's a maverick, leader, ascension card, or similar.
This aspect allows the element to be picked up in the Season of Ambitions as though it were a Desire.
This aspect keeps the element from being picked up in the Season of Ambitions, even if it's a Desire.

elements.description: Something I can consider when meditating on my goals.
elements.comments: This aspect allows the element to be placed in the Dream verb when dreaming about a Temptation.

elements.description: Something I can't consider when meditating on my goals.
elements.comments: This aspect prevents the element from being placed in the Dream verb when dreaming about a Temptation.
